channel.title: Need Team
channel.description:
Ok so I have an Idea for a great game. The only problem s I need a developement team to help me. This is far from a one person project and I would like to know who is interested. Once the game is finished, copies will be sold online for 10-40$'s a piece on many different websites. If the project works out alrighte then of course everyone will get there share of the money.
I am currently working on finishing the plans and the corporate website. The website will be strictly for the teams eyes only. It will be password protected as well. If you are caught showing any part of our plans to anyone outside of the team you will be fined a fee of $300.00. If you would like to sign up for the job please post a copy of the form below.
Full Name: Birth Date: Programming Experience: (Language and years worked with) Are you strong in 3d design?: Do you agree to keep team plans and documents soley to you're eyes only, to not sell any documents or plans illigaly or without owners consent? Do you agree totake part in the project and work an equal amount to everyone else.:______________________ Sign Here and Paste on page. ( You may Email to xxspikeyhairxx@yahoo.com as well or send to my home adress(I well give to you privately) Tell us about yourself: Which Job are you interested in:
Team: Owner/Leader: Matt Arnold (Me) Co Leader: Steven Arnold (pending) Coders: Me
3D Graphic editors:
Concept Artists:
Imagineers:
(If you are interested in any of the above please Write down in the form.)
Other Info: There will not be any pay during the making of the game. The profits are soley on how many copys are sold. The better the game, the more coppies that will be sold. This will bring people to want to work harder on making an even better game.
Contact: Email:xxspikeyhairxx@yahoo.com Phone: Will be given to team partners Adress: Will be given to team partbers

item.title: Need Team
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“sdouble, post:6, topic:133731”][quote author=cooper link=topic=184993.msg1785219#msg1785219 date=1190956011]

i seriously cant trust that you will be making a good game when you apparently own a rs private server

sometimes they can
but sorry spikey hair you arent really believable at the time, try getting some more credibility by showing some proof first
[/quote]

Well, he stated his opinion. And an opinion isn’t fact. He didn’t say that “No one that ‘owns’ and RS private server could make anything decent.” He said “i seriously cant trust that you will be making a good game when you apparently own a rs private server” which can’t be proven wrong.

But the important point of my post: 50+ rep = Community Member. Congrats lawl when someone gets around to giving it to you.[/quote]
yes, i know what you mean, sorry i didnt make my response very clear, im definitely not thinking straight today, sorry if i sounded offensive or putdownish to you lawl, i did not mean anything bad, just meant to state my opinion
oh and yes congrats lawl!

Read full topic

item.title: Need Team
item.dc:creator: @sdouble sdouble
item.description:
@sdouble wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:5, topic:133731”][quote author=lawl link=topic=184993.msg1719241#msg1719241 date=1188596052]
i seriously cant trust that you will be making a good game when you apparently own a rs private server
[/quote]
sometimes they can… but sorry spikey hair you arent really believable at the time, try getting some more credibility by showing some proof first[/quote]

Well, he stated his opinion. And an opinion isn’t fact. He didn’t say that “No one that ‘owns’ and RS private server could make anything decent.” He said “i seriously cant trust that you will be making a good game when you apparently own a rs private server” which can’t be proven wrong.

But the important point of my post: 50+ rep = Community Member. Congrats lawl when someone gets around to giving it to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Team
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

On another topic

i seriously cant trust that you will be making a good game when you apparently own a rs private server

sometimes they can… but sorry spikey hair you arent really believable at the time, try getting some more credibility by showing some proof first

item.title: Need Team
item.description:
@2142 wrote:

Full Name: I’ll tell you when this project acually goes somewhere.
Birth Date: sometime in the last 50 years. (no i’m not that old.)
Programming Experience: assembly and a bit of vb.
Are you strong in 3d design?: stronger in it than programming.

Do you agree to keep team plans and documents soley to you’re eyes only, to not sell any documents or plans illigaly or without owners consent? Do you agree totake part in the project and work an equal amount to everyone else.:__________2142_________Sign Here and Paste on page.

(yes yes i agree to keep all plans and documens safe.)

Tell us about yourself:
Which Job are you interested in: 3D Graphic editors as a texture artist. I’ve got 3 years experience with photoshop as a graphic designer and texture artist. Texture artist skills include low-high poly normal map baking, creation in specular and diffuse maps. as well as UVW mapping with a Wacom graphire 6x8 tablet.

My skinning talent resides in non-organic models (preferably props and environmental). Sorry that i don’t have any portfolio online yet.

and if you don’t mind me asking. what engine is this going to be in?

and i’d rather not give out my name and adress unless this project actually reaches its final stages. and i still doubt that you’ll be able to sell. some mods turn out better than standalone games. i.e dystopia, insurgency, and counter-strike (at one point).

Mopman:

[quote]If you are caught showing any part of our plans to anyone outside of the team you will be fined a fee of $300.00.

This is practically non-enforcable without a decent NDA, validated by a lawyer.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Daed Daed
item.description:
@Daed wrote:

Full Name: Charles manson
Birth Date: 12th November 1934
Programming Experience: Sometimes i watch tv
Are you strong in 3d design?: No
Do you agree to keep team plans and documents soley to you’re eyes only, to not sell any documents or plans illigaly or without owners consent? Do you agree totake part in the project and work an equal amount to everyone else.: No
( You may Email to xxspikeyhairxx@yahoo.com as well or send to my home adress(I well give to you privately)
Tell us about yourself: I am the leader of the Manson family, a commune, which most consider a cult, that began to form around me in San Francisco.
Which Job are you interested in: I like the sound of being a imagineer.
